channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Hobart Hurricanes vs Melbourne Stars Free Streams: How to watch BBL15 Knockout online from anywhere
item.description: All the ways to watch Hobart Hurricanes vs Melbourne Stars in BBL15 Knockout with a spot in Friday's Challenger up for grabs.

item.title: “It is genuinely hard; we need to protect vulnerable users, while also making sure our guardrails still allow all of our users to benefit from our tools” — Sam Altman bemoans the difficulty of keeping ChatGPT safe in contentious debate with Elon Musk
item.description: Sam Altman defended OpenAI’s approach to AI safety in a public clash with Elon Musk, revealing the complex challenge of building tools that protect vulnerable users without limiting everyone else.

item.title: One year in, Big Tech has out-maneuvered MAGA populists
item.description: Welcome to Regulator, a newsletter for Verge subscribers about the technology and the tech bros upending American politics and the Trump administration. If you're not a subscriber yet, and you're interested in Silicon Valley's adventures in sausage-making, you should do so here! It's Q1! Surely the corporate budget will allow for it. Precisely one year […]...

item.title: Tired of seeing Low Battery pop-up on iPhone? Here are 5 simple display settings to improve your battery life
item.description: These easy tips can help you extend your iPhone's battery life by changing how its display behaves.
